message.content:
cs.CV, cs.GR, cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.MM 

The paper proposes a method for applying convolutional neural networks (CNNs) to omni-directional images, specifically using a spherical polyhedron representation. This involves image classification and detection tasks, which are commonly associated with computer vision (cs.CV) and graphics (cs.GR) sub-categories. The paper also introduces new convolution and pooling methods, which are related to machine learning (cs.LG) and artificial intelligence (cs.AI) sub-categories. Finally, the proposed method can be applied to existing CNN-based methods, which is relevant to multimedia (cs.MM) sub-category.
